title: ハイパーリキッド・ストラテジーズ、最大約47億円規模の自社株買い実施へ
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ハイパーリキッドの財務企業ハイパーリキッド・ストラテジーズは、最大約47億円規模の自社株買いを実施すると発表。延期や中止の可能性もあるが最大で12カ月間実施する計画である。

title: アルゼンチン中銀、民間銀行による仮想通貨取引の解禁を検討か＝報道
contentSnippet: ビットコイン支持のミレイ政権下で、アルゼンチン中央銀行が民間銀行による仮想通貨取引サービスの許可を検討中だと伝えられる。実現すれば普及が促進される可能性もある。

title: UAE初、イスラム系銀行ルヤがビットコイン投資サービスを開始
contentSnippet: UAE拠点のイスラム銀行ルヤが8日、仮想通貨インフラプロバイダーのフューズと提携し、モバイルアプリを通じてビットコイン投資サービスを開始した。イスラム系銀行として初めて顧客にBTCの売買を可能にする。

title: Bitcoin catches a bid, but data shows pro traders skeptical of rally above $92K
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's rejection at the short-term range highs is caused by macroeconomic uncertainty, liquidations and stagnant spot ETF flows. Will clearer signals from the US economy boost BTC volumes?

title: PLUMEとJUPITERがコインベースに新規上場、機関投資家向けアクセスも提供
contentSnippet: 米コインベースが12月9日にプルームとジュピターの現物取引を開始する。RWAトークン化のプルームとソラナ系DEXアグリゲーターのジュピターが新規上場し、機関投資家向けアクセスも利用可能になる。

title: Tether Invests in Italian Robotics Startup Generative Bionics Amid Humanoid Hype
contentSnippet: Stablecoin issuer Tether has joined an $81 million round as humanoid robotics draws increasing investor interest.

title: SECがOndoへの捜査を訴追なしで終了、トークン化証券のハードルをクリア
contentSnippet: トークン化プラットフォームのオンド・ファイナンスが、バイデン政権下で開始されたSECの捜査が訴追なしで終了したと発表した。トークン化証券が米国資本市場の中核となる時期が到来したと同社は期待。

title: CFTC to Pilot Tokenized Collateral in Derivatives Markets Starting With Bitcoin, Ethereum and USDC
contentSnippet: The CFTC has introduced a pilot allowing Bitcoin, Ethereum, and USDC to be used as margin, while updating rules to support tokenized assets.

title: 「市場心理は改善を継続」仮想通貨投資商品、先週は1110億円超の資金が純流入＝CoinShares
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨投資企業CoinSharesは、デジタル資産投資商品全体の先週の資金フローは約1,116億円の純流入だったと報告。ビットコイン、XRP、チェーンリンクの投資商品の需要が高かった。

title: Crypto, TradFi sentiment improves: Will Bitcoin traders clear shorts above $93K?
contentSnippet: Improving retail crypto and TradFi investor sentiment align with the recent uptick in Bitcoin price, but sell orders and short positions in the $93,000 range threaten to cap the rally.

title: ビットコイン担保をデリバティブ市場で使用、米CFTCがトークン化パイロットプログラムを開始
contentSnippet: 米CFTCがビットコイン、イーサリアム、USDCなどのデジタル資産をデリバティブ市場で担保として使用するパイロットプログラムを開始した。トークン化担保に関する新たなガイダンスも発行している。

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: CFTC Launches Digital Assets Pilot Allowing Bitcoin, Ether and USDC as Collateral
contentSnippet: Acting Chair Caroline Pham has unveiled a first-of-its-kind U.S. program to permit tokenized collateral in derivatives markets, citing "clear guardrails" for firms.

title: Saylor pitches Bitcoin-backed banking system to nation-states
contentSnippet: Speaking in Abu Dhabi, the Strategy CEO said nations could use Bitcoin reserves and tokenized credit markets to offer regulated accounts with higher yields.

title: ストラテジーが約1500億円でビットコイン押し目買い、7月以来の規模に
contentSnippet: マイケル・セイラー率いるストラテジーが先週約10億ドルで10624BTCを追加購入した。7月以来の大口購入となった。

title: リップルの780億円資金調達、異例の年10%リターン保証で株式売却　投資家ヘッジに応じて＝報道
contentSnippet: ブルームバーグによると、リップルが11月に実施した5億ドルの株式売却で、投資家に3〜4年後に最低10%の年間リターン保証で未上場株式を売却する権利を提供していた。企業価値は400億ドルと評価されている。

title: Crypto Markets Flash Green, But Bitcoin and Ethereum Are in a Death Cross: Analysis
contentSnippet: Markets open in green after a week of recovery, but the movement isn't enough to call it bullish yet. The death cross looms large over both Bitcoin and Ethereum.

title: CoreWeave plans $2B note offering to scale AI business while managing dilution
contentSnippet: CoreWeave plans a $2 billion convertible note offering as it scales AI infrastructure, following a yearlong pursuit of Core Scientific for added power capacity.

title: Bitcoin Treads Water Near $90K as Bitfinex Warns of 'Fragile Setup' to Shocks
contentSnippet: BTC's relative weakness compared to stocks points to tepid spot demand, making the largest crypto vulnerable to macro volatility, Bitfinex analysts said.

title: ブラックロックもステーキング商品提供へ、イーサリアム現物ETFで
contentSnippet: 世界最大の資産運用会社ブラックロックがステーキング機能を備えたイーサリアムETFの登録届出書をSECに提出した。グレースケールやフィデリティなど他の発行体も仮想通貨ETFにステーキング機能を追加している。

title: U.S. Regulator Pushes Back on Banks Fighting Crypto's Pursuit of Trust Charters
contentSnippet: Comptroller of the Currency Jonathan Gould spoke at an industry event in Washington, arguing that the OCC won't resist crypto because of banker complaints.

title: US judge asks for clarification on Do Kwon’s foreign charges
contentSnippet: The Terraform Labs co-founder could face up to 40 years in prison in South Korea, but a judge questioned whether the country would ignore his US sentence.

title: StableChain launches mainnet with USDT gas fees, dedicated governance token
contentSnippet: The USDT-powered network launches with support from Bitfinex, Hack VC, Tether executives and other investors following a $28 million seed round.

title: Binance Suspends Employee That Used Official X Account to Promote BNB Chain Token
contentSnippet: Crypto exchange Binance has disciplined an employee after they used a brand account to promote the launch of a meme coin they helped create.

title: Watchdog asks for crypto industry feedback on UK investment reforms
contentSnippet: The Financial Conduct Authority asked for companies linked to digital assets to weigh in on policy proposals in February and March 2026.

title: XRP needs a Solana-style strategy to keep up: Ripple executive
contentSnippet: Luke Judges highlights how XRP Ledger’s tech and developer tools could take cues from Solana to stay competitive among layer-1 networks.

title: Bitcoin ETF Giant BlackRock Files to Launch Ethereum Staking ETF
contentSnippet: Investment firm BlackRock filed the S-1 registration statement for a new Ethereum staking ETF, ETHB, separate from its existing ETHA fund.

title: Ondo Finance Says Biden-Era SEC Investigation Closed With No Charges
contentSnippet: Ondo Finance said that tokenization’s future looks brighter in the U.S. following the SEC’s closure of a years-long probe into its business.

title: Why Grayscale thinks Bitcoin will ignore the 4-year cycle this time
contentSnippet: Grayscale argues Bitcoin’s market structure has evolved beyond the old four-year rhythm. Institutional flows and macro dynamics have reshaped BTC’s price behavior.

title: 40% of Canadian Crypto Users Flagged for Tax Evasion Risk, Canadian Tax Authority Reveals
contentSnippet: Canada’s tax agency says legal gaps limit its ability to track crypto-related income as it recovers $100 million through audits and pushes for tighter regulation.

title: Script to Nuke AI Features from Windows 11 Goes Viral Amid Privacy Backlash
contentSnippet: A GitHub script that disables Copilot, Recall, and other AI components in Windows 11 is going viral, echoing ongoing concerns about Microsoft’s push.

title: Bitcoin ETFs Pull in $352 Million to Extend Rebound While XRP Funds Remain Hot
contentSnippet: Bitcoin ETFs capture $352 million as bearish bets retreat, hinting investor pessimism may have reached its low point.

title: Tom Lee’s BitMine Buys $429 Million in Ethereum as ETH Rebounds
contentSnippet: Ethereum is up nearly 11% on the week, and top ETH treasury firm BitMine is still adding to its $12 billion stash.

title: ICP Rises, Keeping Price Above Key Support Levels
contentSnippet: Internet Computer rose, keeping the price above the $3.40 support zone, with early session volume spikes failing to produce a sustained breakout.

title: UK’s Anti-Corruption Strategy Targets Crypto Sanctions Evasion
contentSnippet: As part of the newly announced strategy, the UK will host an Illicit Finance Summit next year focused on enhancing international cooperation.

title: CoreWeave Stock Falls 8% on $2B Convertible Debt Offering
contentSnippet: Though remaining sharply higher than their IPO price, shares have struggled over the past six months, losing 50%.

title: Digital Assets to Shift From Disruption to Integration in 2026, CoinShares Says
contentSnippet: 'Hybrid finance' is taking hold as traditional institutions tokenize funds and deposits on public blockchains.

title: CoinDesk's Most Influential 2025
contentSnippet: CoinDesk presents our annual list of the most influential individuals in crypto this year.

title: Argentina’s Central Bank to Allow Banks to Provide Crypto Services in 2026
contentSnippet: Argentina’s central bank is reportedly drafting new rules to allow banks to offer customers digital asset-related services as early as April 2026.

title: Pye Finance Raises $5M Seed Round Led by Variant and Coinbase Ventures
contentSnippet: The platform aims to make locked Solana staking positions tradable via an onchain marketplace.
